name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech

Adept in Agile methodologies, and version control systems including **Git** and **Subversion**. Experienced in utilizing Linux environments and containerization tools such as **Docker**.
Demonstrated expertise in developing applications using cloud-native architectures and integrating continuous delivery practices.
